title: "South Korea spy agency says no signs North Korea's Kim received heart surgery: Yonhap"
excerpt: "There are no signs North Korean leader Kim Jong Un received heart surgery when he disappeared from state media for three weeks, but he reduced public activity due to coronavirus concerns, Yonhap news agency reported on Wednesday."
